p: All chemicals and reagents used in this study were of analytical grade. The EPA 524.2 fortification solution (20 μg/mL of fluorobenzene, 4-bromofluorobenzene, and 1,2-dichlorobenzene- d 4 ) (Sigma-Aldrich, Tokyo Japan) was used as an internal standard (IS). The n-alkane standard solution purchased from Fluka Chemical (Tokyo, Japan) was used for the determination of the RI (C8–C20). The EDTA solution in a concentration of 100 mM (pH 7.5) was used to inhibit enzymatic activity [ 1].
